body: Hi Lorenzo, Do you want to do it in 3D or 2D? You can get the data from importEPW, then user averageData to select it for the time period and then use 3D chart to create the graph. Here is an example: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iJVROLF4NIsgxYwGh*DF-Zqe7M1hTVC-AbYNHMoA97QBI3cf9KItDeZiOW7h29lZ3hl4DNWnBs7XquPVSZoIvc5wL34dj59p/CloudCover3DChart.png)
